column18: 05/22/2012: Assailants threw incendiary devices at the home of Amara Konneh, the Liberian Finance Minister, in Monrovia city, Montserrado county, Liberia. Konneh was unharmed, as the devices failed to detonate and were removed. No group claimed responsibility for the attack.
column38: Liberian Ministry of Finance and Development Planning
column39: Residence of Finance Minister: Amara Konneh
column97: Petrol bombs were used in the attack.
